abstract.p: Dancer Julie Kent says working with choreographer Anthony Dowell on Dream was privilege; photo (S)

block.p: JULIE KENT Principal dancer, American Ballet Theater

The opportunity to work with Anthony Dowell on ''The Dream'' -- not just for me personally, but for the company. Working with the person who originated the role gave us an idea of the mystery needed to bring the parts to life. I had been an admirer of his while he was a dancer, so it was also a privilege for me -- unique and extraordinary on a very small level.
JULIE KENT Principal dancer, American Ballet Theater

The opportunity to work with Anthony Dowell on ''The Dream'' -- not just for me personally, but for the company.
